name: HangTogether
description:
HangTogether is a Online-Coop Hangman game that can also be played alone.

Key Features


  • Chill Ambient Music
  • Huge (Over 50k) list of available words
  • Play with up to 5 other players
  • Local Player Statistics along with Steam Achievements
  • Play against your friends in the Frenemies game mode.

Mac and Linux builds will be available shortly after release.
